original_text: There was a pot full of cheap wine there. So someone put a piece of cloth into the wine. They fixed the cloth to the end of a branch. The branch was from a plant called hyssop. Then they lifted the cloth up to Jesus' mouth.
korean_text: 거기 신 포도주가 가득히 담긴 그릇이 있는지라 사람들이 신 포도주를 적신 해면을 우슬초에 매어 예수의 입에 대니

sentences.original_text: There was a pot full of cheap wine there
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에 싸구려 포도주가 가득 담긴 항아리가 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: So someone put a piece of cloth into the wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 한 사람이 천 조각을 포도주에 넣었습니다

sentences.original_text: They fixed the cloth to the end of a branch
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 천을 나무 가지 끝에 고정했습니다

sentences.original_text: The branch was from a plant called hyssop
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나무 가지는 히솝이라 불리는 식물에서 온 것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they lifted the cloth up to Jesus' mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 천을 예수님의 입으로 들어 올렸습니다
